text: Lawrence John Delaney (born 1935) is a United States scientist and businessman. He served as Assistant Secretary of the Air Force (Acquisition) from 1999 to 2001, and briefly as Acting United States Secretary of the Air Force in 2001. In 2003, he joined L-3 Communications / Titan Corp., becoming its president and CEO.Profile from Bloomberg Business Week ==References== Category:Living people Category:1935 births Category:Engineers from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Scientists from New York (state) Category:United States Secretaries of the Air Force
title: Lawrence J. Delaney
